WITH PART_INF AS ( /*품목정보*/ SELECT P1.PD_CD , P2.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P2.PD_NM /*품목명*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL06 AS AS_LDTM /*리드타임, AS_LDTM*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD /*자재관리유형, AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD, MAT_MNGT_DV_CD */ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD /*AS자재 공통분류, AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD, CMN_PART_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN /*회전율 대상여부, TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL07 AS MIN_GO_QTY /*최소발주량, MIN_GO_QTY*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL32 AS UI_EXPSR_YN /*사용여부*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL36 AS SV_MAT_GRP_CD /*서비스자재그룹 A 일반, B 설치, C 필터, D 피팅/폼, E 중수리, F 소모품, G 공구*/ , (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) AS AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD /*PD_GRP_CD AS자재 품목그룹*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL26 AS AS_SPL_UNIT_AMT /*물류의 공급단가(물류 매각시 사용단가)*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD , P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' /* 상품 검색조건 */
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 IN ('4', '5') /*AS자재 품목종류, AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD, ITM_KND_CD*/
AND (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) = ${pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */
/* AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31= '42802000000' */ ) , CNTR_INF AS ( /*계약정보*/ SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T4.RCGVP_KNM /*수령자한글명*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 /*계약기본*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소,3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T3.VL_STRT_DTM AND T3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID WHERE 1=1 ) , OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF AS ( /* 조직 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.WARE_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO , S1.STD_WARE_USE_YN /*표준창고사용여부*/ , O2.PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM , O2.FST_CNTR_DT /*최초계약일자*/ , O2.FNL_CLTN_DT /*최종해약일자*/ , O2.RCNTR_DT /*재계약일자*/ , O2.CLTN_DT /*해약일자*/ , O2.CNTR_DT /*계약일자*/ , O2.BZ_STAT_CD /*사업상태코드, 1 사업, 2 해약, 3 휴업*/ , O2.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , O2.RSB_DV_CD /*직책구분코드*/ , O2.ROL_DV_CD /*직무구분코드*/ , O2.PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , O2.QLF_DV_CD /*자격구분코드*/ , O2.PERF_EXCD_OJ_YN /*실적제외대상여부*/ , O2.RDS_DSB_EXCD_OJ_YN /*RDS지급제외대상여부*/ , COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY HGR_OG_ID ORDER BY HGR_OG_ID) AS HTR_CNT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID /* AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD LIKE '2%' */ /* AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' */ /*미사용창고에서 반품 되는 경우도 있기 때문에*/ AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON S1.APY_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO
AND O2.CLTN_DT IS NULL /* 퇴사자 제외 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{startDt},1,6) /* 조직 검색조건 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /* 매니저 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /* 엔지니어 */
ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) /* 필터사용현황(작업출고) */ SELECT /*+ INDEX(S1 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) */ S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT , S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , C1.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_NM , S1.FNL_SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', S1.FNL_SELL_TP_CD, 'ko') AS FNL_SELL_TP_NM , S1.FNL_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM AS PD_NM , S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', S1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD, 'ko') AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_NM , P2.SAP_MAT_CD , S1.ITM_PD_CD , P2.PD_NM AS ITM_PD_NM , S1.USE_QTY , S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD, 'ko') AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_NM , S1.REFRI_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'REFRI_DV_CD', S1.REFRI_DV_CD, 'ko') AS REFRI_DV_NM , O1.PRTNR_NO , O1.PRTNR_KNM , O1.OG_NM , S1.MNGR_DV_CD , S1.WK_WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN PART_INF P1 ON S1.FNL_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN PART_INF P2 ON S1.ITM_PD_CD = P2.PD_CD INNER JOIN CNTR_INF C1 ON S1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON S1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO AND S1.WK_WARE_NO = O1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 반품이 아니고, 사용수량이 있을 경우만 */ AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' AND S1.USE_QTY > 0 AND S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} /* 검색조건 */
AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{svBizHclsfCd} /* 자료구분코드 */
AND S1.ITM_PD_CD BETWEEN #{itmCdFrom} AND #{itmCdTo}
AND S1.FNL_SELL_TP_CD = #{fnlSellTpCd} /* 고객구분코드 */
AND S1.REFRI_DV_CD = #{refriDvCd} /* 유무상구분코드 */
AND S1.MNGR_DV_CD = #{mngrDvCd} /* 관리 구분코드 */
/* 창고 검색조건 */
AND O1.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} /* 창고구분*/
AND ( O1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{wareNoM} OR O1.WARE_NO = #{wareNoM} ) /* 조직창고 */
AND O1.WARE_NO = #{wareNoD} /* 개인창고 */
ORDER BY S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT , S1.CNTR_NO
